title: 11.6p land with two storied spacious house only for land value
details:
Two storied house only for land value
Solidly built two storied spacious house for sale only for land value
This is ideal for commercial purpose as well as residential purpose
11.6p land with house situated close to Narahenpita junction, 100 meters to the junction
Facing to 30 ft wide access road
House consists with Four rooms and three bathrooms, pantry, wet kitchen, servant room and bathroom
